mention.text: Terry Anderson , the last American hostage in Lebanon
the last American hostage in Lebanon
the third American hostage freed in three days
a painful day for his relatives and friends.
the way it 's been for almost seven years
U.N. Secretary-General Javier Perez de Cuellar
delicate negotiations involving a complex swap of Western hostages
negotiations involving a complex swap of Western hostages
a complex swap of Western hostages
a complex swap of Western hostages
hundreds of Arabs held by Israel and information about missing Israeli military personnel.
hundreds of Arabs held by Israel
Iran 's Tehran Radio this week to have been promised that they would not be pursued by the United States , Germany or any other country.
the Islamic Jihad group that held Anderson announced today he would be set free
Sulome , born three months after he was kidnapped

Shiite militants seeking the release of Mohammed and Abbas Hamadi , brothers imprisoned in Germany on terrorism convictions. ; Terry Anderson : chronology of captivity ; 1985 ; March 16 - Anderson abducted on Beirut street by Islamic Jihad. ; May 16 - First photo of Anderson in captivity released

brothers imprisoned in Germany on terrorism convictions. ; Terry Anderson : chronology of captivity ; 1985 ; March 16 - Anderson abducted on Beirut street by Islamic Jihad. ; May 16 - First photo of Anderson in captivity released
Jacobsen , freed after 17 months in captivity
Shiite comrades jailed in Kuwait. ; 1990 ; Feb. 9
her brother 's freedom. ; May 7 - Say is told by newly freed hostage Frank Reed
